entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add loading of [ApplicationName].settings.json & [ApplicationName].settings.[EnvironmentName].json to default WebHost #61343
  • Roadmap for SignalR-Client-Cpp project #61342
  • Model not created on post with EditForm #61341
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #61340
  • Validation support in Minimal APIs should be AOT compatible #61339
  • Allow Assets API to emit lowercase URLs for fingerprinted assets #61338
  • Perf improvement: mTls-handshakes-kestrel #61337
  • Perf improvement: kestrel-encoded-url, kestrel-encoded-url, mTls-handshakes-kestrel #61336
  • Perf improvement: mTls-handshakes-kestrel, tls-handshakes-kestrel, tls-renegotiation-httpsys #61335
  • Perf improvement: httpsys-encoded-url, mTls-handshakes-httpsys, tls-handshakes-kestrel #61334
  • Perf improvement: mTls-handshakes-httpsys, tls-handshakes-httpsys, tls-renegotiation-httpsys #61333

Closed

  • Blazor AddInteractiveServerComponents conflicts with Identity pages #61320
  • Figma Code Connect for Blazor #61307

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update maintenance-packages versions #61326
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Update MicrosoftBuildVersion to 17.8.3 #61322
    area-infrastructure
  • Use Copy Constructor for JsonSerializerSettings #61251
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .LastIndexOf returns incorrect value #28815

Closed

  • Blazor Hybrid - Publish error NETSDK1152 for Microsoft.Web.WebView2 using EF Core 8 #20677
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Overriding back button functionality with OnBackButtonPressed returning false in a modally pushed page causes stack overflow - fix #28812

Updated

  • [Android] SpacingItemDecoration improvement #27093
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [iOS][Shell][More Tab] Navigation from the 'More' tab - improvements #27932
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Picker Selected item gets cleared in BindableLayout - Fix #26777
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker, .NET 9 SR7
  • Pickers Inside CollectionView get SelectedItem Cleared on Scrolling - UITest #26775
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] Flyout Items Not Displayed in RightToLeft FlowDirection in Landscape - fix #26762
    area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨
  • [Android] Unable to scroll inner CollectionView of nested CollectionViews - fix #26738
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Flyout Icon - RTL support #26737
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [iOS] Replaced MeasureInvalidated with IPlatformMeasureInvalidationController for Shell Flyout's Footer #28775
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell
  • Android TimePicker ignores 24 hour system setting when using Format Property - fix #28797
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [Android][NET 10] Fix: Ensure Image consumes touches properly #28429
    proposal/open, platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add loading of [ApplicationName].settings.json & [ApplicationName].settings.[EnvironmentName].json to default Host #114302
  • Stack overflow in workstation GC `try_allocate_more_space` #114301
  • [API Proposal]: CreateReadOnlySpanFromNullTerminated for 4-byte characters #114297
  • [mono][wasm] intrinsics improvements #114295
    10.0.0

Closed

  • OdbcConnection.GetSchema("Columns") always returns NULL in COLUMN_DEF for Jet ODBC driver #40469
  • [System.Data.Odbc] ODBC cannot read values for types, missing from hardcoded predefined set of types #40707
  • Infinite loop in EventLogWatcher class #109908
  • System.Drawing.Common-8.0.8 upgrade to 9.0.0 crashes my application #111965
  • Stop considering COR_PRF_DISABLE_OPTIMIZATIONS an immutable Event Mask #113921
    10.0.0
  • NativeAOT failure in System.Reflection.Tests.GetTypeTests.GetType_InvalidAssemblyName #114288

PullRequests

Created

  • [clr-interp] Refactor passing of configuration environment variables #114300
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [wasm][interp] skill issue #114293
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix RISC-V Windows build #114292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • JIT: remove dependence on GetThreadCycles #114290
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Update maintenance-packages versions #114281
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unused and unnecessary `CLRConfig`s. #114282
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Adjust for culture name normalization in AssemblyNameInfoFuzzer #114231
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Removing unnecessary comments #114190
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 10.0.0
  • Don't use property for msbuild versions in Versions.props #114298
    needs-area-label
  • [clr-interp] Fix emit of bb end var moves #114267
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Enable RISC-V in coredistools #114291
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix build break with cmake 4.0 #114278
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add System.Net.ServerSentEvents to PackageOverrides.txt #114294
    area-Setup
  • Add FrozenDictionary.Create #114192
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Fix failure in System.Reflection.Tests.GetTypeTests.GetType_InvalidAssemblyName #114289
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Add post-morph profile repair phase #113896
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [RuntimeAsync] Move runtime async to the main repo #113976
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation, runtime-coreclr, runtime-async
  • fix: in rsa signatures, configure digest before padding mode #114261
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2680085 #114238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add bootstrapping build mechanism and enable for SourceBuild #114285
    source-build, area-Infrastructure
  • Learn what's failing about the OSSL tests on new mac queues #114163
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Devirtualization and inlining for GVM #112353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Simplifying the loop generated in genZeroInitFrameUsingBlockInit and jump encoding #114003
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Interpreter GC info stage 2: Generate empty GC info and add baseline implementation of EnumGcRefs #113948
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging][mono][hotreload]Adjust row_size and size_bitfield from the baseline based on the delta sizes #114119
    area-EnC-mono
  • [cDAC] Adds DAC like entrypoint with new COM interface #113899
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Name native threads before start on macOS #114249
    area-System.Threading
  • Move funclets invocation to code managers #114180
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Introduce Zbb #114150
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-05
entry.content:
